Left: Top: Neci gets her picture taken with 72nd Air Base Wing Commander Col. Kenyon Bell following her graduation last month from Airman Leadership School. Top right: Bottom left: Neci was joined by sisters Ciarra (left) and Kylia, grandmother Lula Booker and uncle James “JJ” Simpkins for the occasion at Tinker Air Force Base in Midwest City, Okla. Bottom right: Lula beamed with pride for Neci after the ceremony. (Tom Fox/Staff Photographer)
